Preparing Files for Build Specifications

Before you create a build specification for your application, prepare your files for distribution. For example, if you plan to distribute a stand-alone application to a system that does not have the LabVIEW Development System installed, be sure any properties and methods you use are supported in the LabVIEW Run-Time Engine.

Related Topics

The following topic discusses the necessary steps to help you prepare files for build specifications:

  • VI Server Properties and Methods Not Supported in the LabVIEW Run-Time Engine
